graphql.query:
mutation ($payload:NotificationCreateNotificationInput!)
{
	notificationCreateNotification (payload:$payload)
	{
		id
		tenantId
		status
		accountIds
		tenantIds
		scopes
		sendAt
		isImportant
		subject
		body
		attachments
		totalRecipients
		reads
		meta
	}
}

graphql.query:
query ($query:QueryStatement)
{
	notificationGetNotifications (query: $query)
	{
		id
		tenantId
		status
		accountIds
		tenantIds
		scopes
		sendAt
		isImportant
		subject
		body
		attachments
		totalRecipients
		reads
		meta
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

query ($query:QueryStatement)
{
	notificationFindNotification (query: $query)
	{
		id
		tenantId
		status
		accountIds
		tenantIds
		scopes
		sendAt
		isImportant
		subject
		body
		attachments
		totalRecipients
		reads
		meta
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

query ($id:ID)
{
	notificationFindNotificationById (id:$id)
	{
		id
		tenantId
		status
		accountIds
		tenantIds
		scopes
		sendAt
		isImportant
		subject
		body
		attachments
		totalRecipients
		reads
		meta
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

mutation ($payload:NotificationUpdateNotificationInput!)
{
	notificationUpdateNotification (payload:$payload)
	{
		id
		tenantId
		status
		accountIds
		tenantIds
		scopes
		sendAt
		isImportant
		subject
		body
		attachments
		totalRecipients
		reads
		meta
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

graphql.query:
mutation ($id:ID!)
{
	notificationDeleteNotificationById (id:$id)
	{
		id
		tenantId
		status
		accountIds
		tenantIds
		scopes
		sendAt
		isImportant

}

mutation ($query:QueryStatement)
{
	notificationDeleteNotifications (query: $query)
	{
		id
		tenantId

		sendAt
		isImportant

}
